website_summaries.verdict: A stable, smooth wheel loved by women and average-size men.
pros: Double wheel design gives more stability than a single-wheel design and more efficiently works your core
cons: Men with larger hands may want to try another model

customer_reviews.title: Smoother than any other ab wheel out there
customer_reviews.text: Smoother than any other ab wheel I've ever used. I've used multiple different kinds, and this by far tops them all. If you don't have a strong core you won't be able to use it at full function at first. Just going out a little bit at a time still engages all those muscles that you need to be able to do a full rep. Baby steps. Also I love the fact that it's a family based company. Didn't get any better than that.
customer_reviews.author: 3dm's

customer_reviews.title: Approved by ab rollout aficionado
customer_reviews.text: I am an ab wheel aficionado. Like Bob Backlund, I believe that ab rollouts are a complete upper body exercise. (It works virtually every major muscle in your upper body, except maybe your biceps. Get a stacking resistance band on top of this, and you're set.) I have tried many types of rollers, and this is one of my absolute favorites. It is very smooth and stable, and small enough to throw into your suitcase. I know I sound like a shill, but I'm genuinely enthusiastic about this wheel. Give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lau

customer_reviews.title: ... is not exactly what the elite ab wheel looks like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: This is not exactly what the elite ab wheel looks like in the picture.. the one I got feels cheap and plasticy. I mean it gets the job done, but it squeaks when I use it and I am not a heavy person. The wheels are supposed to be rubbery as you can see in the picture on the box but the one I got is pure plastic. Also you can see the lines on the handle bars that the one in the picture does not have. A little disappointed but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Floto

customer_reviews.title: What a surprise!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried about this product because of how lightweight it is but surprisingly its extremely sturdy. I learned how to use it right off the get-go and let me tell you it will blast your back and abs, works the arms and shoulders too. I'm really happy that I got this product and plan on getting more products from elite. This is an amazing and cheap product. If you have back problems like I do an sit-ups/crunches don't do it for you THIS will!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND HIGHLY.
customer_reviews.text: THIS AB WHEEL REALLY WORKS. I COULD ONLY DO FIVE REPS THE FIRST TIME. IT REALLY WORKS YOU OUT. SUCH A SIMPLE LITTLE DEVISE DOES SO MUCH. RECOMMEND HIGHLY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent ab roller!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this after a friend showed me how to use one at the gym. never have i felt my abs more sore in my life. as for this specific product itself, you can tell the quality of this ab roller is amazing compared to the ones they use at gyms. the wheels roll smoothly and the ab roller feels light yet durable. i use it on my carpet/hardwood floors
customer_reviews.author: Andes Le

customer_reviews.title: Excellent home and portable exercise
customer_reviews.text: Great value, quality construction, family business. It's been years since I've worked out. Before spending on a gym membership, decided to get a couple home workout pieces. This about roller works. Seeing results after a week. 5' 9" 200lbs. It's durable and inexpensive. A couple sets in the morning, a couple at night. Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: El Jefe

customer_reviews.title: great price for the value
customer_reviews.text: works great. not the most comfortable so if you have sensitive hands maybe you want something that spreads the weight out a little more or has more cushion. read quite a bit of people complaining it's not easy or hard on the back. Your back and abs work together so naturally it effects your back. also you don't have to start out so difficult, especially if you're not in shape! start up against a wall or object to limit how far forward you can go. that will help you get to the point you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: BIG BANG FOR THE BUCKS
customer_reviews.text: Am a 'once upon a time' ab wheel user who recently purchased the "Eiite" model. Am especially impressed with the overall quality. The fact that the wheels are of a lesser diameter than my previous model and that they are spaced a short distance apart appears to minimalize the 'wobble' factor when muscles become fatigued. Conversely, it is no longer an instrument of torture, but now a effective mode of core conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: scothiker

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps I'm not using it right ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this about 5 days ago, after viewing several videos on the right technique for beginners. I've been doing 10 and then 20 reps per session. So far, no satisfying "ache" in my abs, but PLENTY in my pectoral muscles. Admittedly I can do 50 crunches without breaking a sweat -- but I was under the impression that this device really makes your core feel a difference. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, or maybe I need to step up the reps? So far, I'm a wee bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Steele

customer_reviews.title: The ab roller wheel is as good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The ab roller wheel is as good as advertised and the website and print out instructions for the ab roller wheel are quite good and show how a simple product like this can be used to improve personal fitness. Durable enough for home use and provides better balance than many single-wheel versions. May also be a good way to warm-up before doing chin-ups.
customer_reviews.author: nomobadges

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ab Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I love this Ab Wheel. It is really well made. Very sturdy, rolls very well, and the handles are pretty pleasant to hold. It's small enough to throw in your backpack and take to the gym, which is what I do since my gym doesn't have one of these (don't know if many gyms do). I have been using this for tabatas (8 sets of 20 seconds on/10 seconds off). It has crushed my abs in a good way, and at no point have my hands felt sore. Very pleased with this and would recommend it to anyone looking for a good ab wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Conway Stern

customer_reviews.title: Former DIVSION ONE collegiate athlete gets DESTROYED by ab wheel
customer_reviews.text: I thought this ab wheel would be a joke for my elite athletic capabilities. I was wrong. I had not worked serious ab exercises in a few months (or exercise at all for that matter) and bought this to gain back a good core base strength before moving to a full workout schedule. In a good way, using this for only like 5 minutes the first day left me unable to perform ab workouts for days! I was so sore. I have been using it daily for about two weeks now and have already seen amazing results from loss of stomach fat to regaining that nice "V" figure and ab definition back. Would definitely recommend! 6'1" ~180 pounds for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Johnson

customer_reviews.title: First Ab Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try one of these after reading so many good things about the workout you get with them. Chose the 2 wheel version for balance purposes. Really feel the abs working. Had been doing ab exercises, but must not have been hitting some of the muscles hard enough. This is good. Getting better after a couple of weeks with how far I can extend.
customer_reviews.author: W88s

customer_reviews.title: Frills?  I've got your frills for ya!
customer_reviews.text: It's possible that I got a mediocre one - I opened the box and the roller is there without *any* packaging, not even a plastic bag. A return? It resembles the pictures but seems to pull a part a touch in the middle contributing to a slight wobble - not sure if that's normal or not. Can't compare to instructions because it doesn't come with anything (maybe they mention it on one of the videos linked on the box). On the positive side, the plastic doesn't feel "cheap" and it looks like they applied the cost savings to the price...but come on folks, would it have killed you to print a sheet of paper worth of instructions?
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: This Ab Wheel is well made with no assembly needed. I've only had it a week but each day I see a progression in how far I can stretch forward and return without face planting on the rug. The videos on the web site give good info on how to begin and how to progress slowly. I use a chair leg to stop my forward progress and each day I start off farther from the chair. This is a good device to strengthen your body from the waist up. I feel a change in my arm and chest strength.
customer_reviews.author: Shrek

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised, I needed the ab wheel to increase variety in my ab workouts and strengthen my core for boxing and Thai Boxing I've been using it non-stop for the past month so far and it hasn't given out on me yet. My main concern was making sure it would be well balanced and wouldn't snap Midway workout. I'm 200 lbs muscular build so I can definitely attest to it's duribility. So far none of the two scenarios happened and am very happy with the price point and quality. Will update review if necessary. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A worth addition to core work
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, light weight ab roller. I have been using this for a year now and the benifits have shown. It was very difficult at first and O had to start on my knees with few reps. Now I can maintain good form on my toes and do multiple reps. As with anything work out related, you must give it time and eat properly to reap benifits.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Ab Wheel
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I wanted. I must admit that I need to practice more, so far I can roll down but I am still having some trouble getting back up. Doctor said it is because of my back; told him I don't want to hear that I am still trying. I used my Ab Wheel again this morning; I rolled down but had to get up to start over. Now I go down three quarters of the way and roll back up, Thanks Michelle; this grandmother appreciate your input. Bye the way I have short arms & long legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K

customer_reviews.title: Ab Wheel Roller Pro
customer_reviews.text: I just started using the ab roller and I can't get over how nice it is and how easy it is to use. The two wheels are separated enough to make it very sturdy and the grips are excellent. It is very light in weight and is easy to store. Their web site has videos about how to use this as well as videos on their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Sprkymrt

customer_reviews.title: I just turned 70 and use it every day easy to use and helps my back
customer_reviews.text: I just turned 70 and use it every day easy to use and helps my back ,now I will tell you that after ten knee roll out for one day I felt it in all of my abs ,bottom top sides and I really like what it is doing for me I will use more of their products as money comes available. I live on my Social Security and don't have alot but as I have extra I will buy other product. Thanks for making things that work for us older folks. Dennis
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this and was on my way to a tighter torso until my German shepherd Dog chewed it up. Super sturdy, I'm only about 120 lbs but It was extremely sturdy so I assume it could withstand much more weight and pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Bon

customer_reviews.title: Solid, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday but it's exactly what's advertised. Solidly built accessory for your home work out. Don't see it wearing out any time soon, even with more than moderate use. Well priced too. Can recommend. .
customer_reviews.author: Stryked

customer_reviews.title: Stable, rolls easly and light weight
customer_reviews.text: The roller is very stable, rolls easily, and is light weight. I was mildly surprised at how sore my abs were the following day. Just gotta keep after it. I work at a desk and doing this several times a day will help.
customer_reviews.author: hank2

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a single wheel roller, but the dual has absolutely no balance issues whatsoever. It's pretty sturdy too, despite being mostly plastic. Mine's held up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Yamashita

customer_reviews.title: Great Roller For Improving Your Core
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It’s a good bargain and I’m glad I bought. Still don’t see my abs yet but...that’s not the products fault. I haven’t used it regularly but it looks cool next to my other fitness equipment I don’t use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Of Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ab Wheel - Get's the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Great ab wheel. The double wheels give it a lot more control and the smaller wheel size creates the ability to get closer to the ground on the roll out. I have been using the ab wheel for about four months with really great results. This is not strong enough to support rollouts from standing if you are over 185 lbs. I can do them and they work, but the smaller wheel size makes it more challenging. I travel internationally and this is great to throw in your suitcase - weighs nothing and travels great.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for your body.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the basic one wheel roller & I thought it was great. But, after using this unit, I know what quality is. This glides easily and the grips are very comfortable. I highly recommend this model. In the box is the roller only & you get an email to download tutorials but hey, it's self explanatory. Great price, easy to use, comfortable, and durable. After using it you will feel like you actually did something positive for you body.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: That I  don't feel like I wasted money on this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. The first time I used it I spent just 10 minutes with my knees on the floor, the following day my abdominal muscles hurt for good two days. That tells me I worked on them.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective version of the ab wheel.
customer_reviews.text: I first started using an ab wheel at my gym and found it helpful for strengthening my abs. When I went to Amazon I found this particular one and got it for all the positive reviews. All I can say is that it works very well. It's not only great for abs but also for my back problems. I take it with me to work and use it at home also. I highly recommend this particular one because of the smooth double wheeled center. This makes it easy not just for going straight out but also sideways for the obliques. The handles are also helpful for grip. Try this one. It works!
customer_reviews.author: C R Heath

customer_reviews.title: ... use it each day although as yet not very good at going too far forward
customer_reviews.text: It arrived very promptly and I try to use it each day although as yet not very good at going too far forward. But it does what it is intended to do as immediately I could feel my abs! Great stuff...such an easy way to tone up....a great tool to work with among all the other things you might do.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Ab roller works rather well (when used). I deducted ...
customer_reviews.text: Ab roller works rather well (when used). I deducted one star because the little bumps on the grip pads dig into your hands and get uncomfortable after 20 or so reps. I weigh around 130 and think anyone heavier would suffer even more discomfort on the grips.
customer_reviews.author: MegARoo

customer_reviews.title: No pain, no gain!
customer_reviews.text: This small contraption hurts like heck. Just got it today and my boyfriend and I tried it out, he likes it and so do I. It might be a painful workout but no pain no gain!
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Okay but Very Cheaply Made. Doubt It Lasts Long.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Does the job for now. However, it is really cheaply made and I highly doubt it will last long especially if a man is using it daily. One of the end caps has already somehow broken off after 2 days of usage lol. I would look into something more heavy duty if you are a man looking to use an ab roller everyday.
customer_reviews.author: DK1980

customer_reviews.title: I love this ab roller
customer_reviews.text: I love this ab roller. It is definitely the best one that I have used. Years ago I had an old one that would barely work and was poorly built. I love the double wheel along with the grip. It feels nice and sturdy. Ab wheels can give you an amazing ab workout and its easy to do anywhere. For your abs I would recommend this for anyone. It is tough and needs proper form but once you know how to do it and build up your core strength it works great. Don't give up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great workout on my body! Can be used on almost any floor surface. The description said that with the two wheels there is more stability and that is very true. The quality is great! -would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This ab roller is lightweight, rolls smoothly, and gives me one heck of a workout! I've been using mine for over a week now, and wow, I'm super sore and am already noticing a huge difference in my posture.
customer_reviews.author: Catie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this for 10 days, but I have enjoyed using it. Of course, no results yet. I like the double wheel design because it adds stability. Also it is pre-assembled so it will not fall apart. It feels solid while using it. The customer service is great and their website has a download booklet on using the wheel. Top it off with a lifetime warranty and you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed my ab Elite Sportz equipment but I am having ...
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed my ab Elite Sportz equipment but I am having a tough time keeping it to myself. My husband loves it too, to the point I am considering buying another one. It's really good for the abs. I wished I purchased it a year ago when I started my gym class. Thumbs up!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: This a very sturdy product. Able to hold my 190lbs well
customer_reviews.text: This a very sturdy product. Able to hold my 190lbs well. I use the matt with my knees and then bend over with roller and go back an forth. At first, put a little strain on my back doing 3sets so I will do a set of 12 or 24 and ease into it. Being 66 with a sensitive back, I will slowly ease into it. Great Product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Berman

customer_reviews.title: Sent used product, not exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t mind being sent an ab wheel that has clearly been used and isn’t exactly as pictured, this is it. Looks and feels like cheap plastic. Saw a few poor and similar reviews, but decided I would give it a shot anyway due to the overwhelming good reviews. Really disappointed as this was supposed to be a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Really durable. My husband is 225 and it supports him. The handles could be a little softer, but it does its job. It will make you work for those abs!
customer_reviews.author: E Johns

customer_reviews.title: Simple enough
customer_reviews.text: Hard to mess this one up, wheels are not as large as I expected. Then again I didn’t read the dimensions before ordering it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and seem to have little time and stamina after work to even think of exercising. I've had the Ab Wheel for about 2 weeks now and have already noticed a difference in my core strength and tone. I used to have frequent back pain from the stressors at work but now I notice I don't have that anymore. I am unable to do any advanced techniques yet but just doing the basics has really helped me. This item is inexpensive but very effective and well made. I highly recommend this product to anyone interested in a low impact simple device that yields positive and immediate results.
customer_reviews.author: TBO

customer_reviews.title: this ab wheel has been better and is a little more stable than the one ...
customer_reviews.text: So far (a couple months of use), this ab wheel has been better and is a little more stable than the one provided at the gym. The handle grips are contoured so it makes for a better grip feel. The wheels are smaller than the one provided by the gym, but that doesn't seem to affect my workout.
customer_reviews.author: loki

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this as part of my HIIT routine on the days when I can't make it to the gym. You'll break before it does!
customer_reviews.author: Muad'Dib

customer_reviews.title: Elite Ab roller is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I go to the gym, the ab roller disappears so I bought one of my own from Elite Sportz. It is the best. It fits snugly in my gym bag and when I want to do abs, no more hunting high and low in the gym. I just reach into my bag, pull out my ab roller from Elite and away I go chiseling my abs. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Norton

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, seeing results.
customer_reviews.text: It works! I can tell by the tightening of my abdominal, I just have to strengthen my back muscles to make sure my posture when going down is not so uncomfortable on my back. After my workout my back hurts a little. I have tried all types of methods in doing the exercise to keep my back in the right position to avoid pain, I have even youtubed and googled. Could be just me but I have never had issues with my back before. Will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Savage1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but not easy for a total novice
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. However, I would warn that if you are in bad shape this exercise will be a bit too intense at first, or you might end up using it wrong. Don't feel too discouraged if you can't extend as far as the athletes using it in videos. It can take several uses to become decent at it if you aren't in great shape. Make sure you can sustain a normal plank for at least 2 minutes before using this, it's harder than a plank.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gould

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: All in all this is a good product. Simple design, but very functional. The only reason I am giving it less than 5 stars is because the plastic wheels tend to develop a static charge that attracts every piece of lint and dust from the floor. I thought my wife kept a clean house till I started rolling this thing across the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Better than dozens of crunches. I felt the burn after my first workout, and I can increase my repetitions with every use. I discovered my ab muscles.
customer_reviews.author: fhughes47

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used a very similar product when I was younger. I like it because of the set up of the wheels, which give it a little more stability. I gave it credit for my 8 pack abs. I have only had it for a week and have already lost an inch of my stomach. I must admit I went at it like I used to, which made my stomach sore. But that is the price you pay for exercise. If you have a 6 pack and want the 8 pack this maybe something you would want to try.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Layton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely feel the burn
customer_reviews.text: Still working on making sure my posture is good when I roll back and keeping that low back straight. I do think you should have some minimal core strength going in with this and not using this as a complete beginner with no core strength unless you are able to really keep your back straight to prevent strain. Works really well on my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: jwizzle

customer_reviews.title: By far the sturdiest and well built Ab Wheel on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other Ab Wheels in other workouts but this is by far the best quality. It feels very sturdy when I am using it and stays on a straight path. I have used other Ab wheels and have had to compensate how much pressure I put on either side because the wheels would stray in different directions. This Ab wheel allows me to stay on a straight path and I can really feel it where I'm supposed to - in my abs!
customer_reviews.author: M. Magpoc

customer_reviews.title: Very effective unit.
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how effective this is. I am 67 year old female in excellent aerobic shape but just a little bit of 'poochy' tummy below the waist. After using this only once from about a half dozen roll outs and roll backs, the next day that area of lower abdomen was sore. Now I'm using it every day and can certainly feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ab workout
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for what it is made for. The grips are nice when you start sweating your hands won't slip off. Having two wheels makes it more stable than the one wheel products.
customer_reviews.author: TheWick

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's not big, but just enough to not scrape your hand on the floor. But it feels sturdy, I am 180lb guy and it doesn't bend under me (even from the toe position). I exercise daily for two weeks now and definitely feel my abs growing!
customer_reviews.author: Olexii

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great Ab roller! Keeps you stable and steady while your perform your exercise. Product is will made and durable. It helped me improve my core strength. My abs are much stronger and defined because of using this product. My obliques are getting a great workout as well.
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are too small. It's solid, but these ...
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are too small. It's solid, but these rollers are much more effective with larger wheels. Wish I had not made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Does not free wheel
customer_reviews.text: Ab roller works as intended but I was under the impression that the wheel was free spinning. other than that it works. Ill use it until breaks.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do- it's not a gimmick. I'm not a fitness expert, but I can tell it works more muscles and works them harder in fewer repetitions than doing crunches. Just make sure you're using it correctly so you don't hurt your back. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: OfficeAdmin

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and small
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I like this or not...Seems smaller than pictured. Is not sturdy. I am not a big person, but this feels wobbly and not strong enough to support my core when using this the correct way. I may return it to order a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: NJLyn

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product is excellent and the info that comes with it is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 74 yr old man and bought the Ab Roller to help me lose 60 lbs. I now have a lot of sore muscles and probably won't get the picture-esk six pack abs but I can tell already it is changing my body. The quality of the product is excellent and the info that comes with it is the best I've been able to come up with. For in-home work outs its great.
customer_reviews.author: David M Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment for working out from home.
customer_reviews.text: For those that don't have time to go to the gym, this is a great alternative to help keep you in shape and tighten up. It tracks well, and the handles don't hurt your hands after prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The product is lighter than I would have imagined, and it seems at first as if it would not hold up to the rigors of being stressed by overweight people, but this thing holds up quite well to continued use without any apparent fatiguing; the only fatigue that occurs is with me, after a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: SPDKLD

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the way it is currently working
customer_reviews.text: The product description did not indicate the product was completely plastic. For the money, I expected at least a rubber type wheel. Being plastic, the wheel will not last very long before it becomes distorted or fails. However, I am pleased with the way it is currently working. When I buy a product of this nature, it is my intention to use it daily. I hope it lasts longer than I think it will last. I am also extremely pleased that the company immediately responded to this review because they wanted me to be a completely satisfied customer. The company exceeded my expectations for satisfying my concerns about their product.
customer_reviews.author: Sircrowe

customer_reviews.title: Don't Need to be in Shape to Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to work out again. While I'm not the best at using this ab wheel, I am getting better at it. It's fun to use, doesn't hurt your back and you can still feel it the next day (even if your not a pro at using it).
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: Received Used One instead of New One!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received the item in rusty condition with so many scratches along the handlers with too much dust on the wheels. It is supposed to be new but I’m sure what I have received is an old used one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rami A.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing compact ab roller!
customer_reviews.text: This ab roller is TINY! I mean that in a complimentary way; compared to other products, this one barely leaves a footprint. The dual wheels along with the single piece construction provides for pretty solid stability (no wobbling, woohoo!). This fits into my workout bag just fine, and hopefully will not cause any troubles on my travels (will udpate if so!).
customer_reviews.author: imyourpal

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: My first ab roller so I don't have any other brand to compare to, but so far so good. Sturdy. Smooth. I'm 140lbs and have no fear of it breaking. I do wear gloves to prevent pressure blisters on my palms. Good customer service. Affordable prices. Prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you watch video on how to use this!
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a couple days since I just received it. I was doing the exercise incorrectly until i watched instruction videos. It is important to do them right or you will mainly feel it in your lower back. I think this will really strengthen my ab muscles.
customer_reviews.author: C Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This AB roller is excellent. It's sturdy, looks great in the gym and works well. The handle bars have anti-slip grips to prevent your hands from slipping. The wheels roll very smoothly giving you a great exercise. Overall, a well built wheel and worth every penny!! I'm a happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Nats

customer_reviews.title: Good One
customer_reviews.text: I like it . Just you need like to do these exercises to like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lakshmikant P.

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, stable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to use and really gets your abs worked out in minimal time! I have used it on thick carpet and on concrete. Both work well. Obviously harder to use on concrete as is rolls very easily where as the carpet gives you a little assistance from drag.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Seiple

customer_reviews.title: ab wheel
customer_reviews.text: gives the core a workout. will build up core strength. will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert V.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty low quality. Basically adequate, but a let down. Everything is hollow plastic. The wheel diameter is fairly small, which limits its use and comfort. Good toy for my kid though.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This little piece of equipment goes a long way in ...
customer_reviews.text: This little piece of equipment goes a long way in a workout. The only change I would make is to choose a less textured grip, as the bumps that are in place for traction actually dig into my palms and irritate/hurt them quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Whittemore

customer_reviews.title: Can really feel it working the ab and chest muscles ...
customer_reviews.text: Can really feel it working the ab and chest muscles. My neighbor bought a cheaper ab roller and she has already given upnusing it -- complains that one of the wheels doesn't turn well, doesn't roll well and is unsteady. I haven't experienced any of those issues with this Ab Wheel Roller. I will likely have to buy one for my husband too!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nana

customer_reviews.title: Roll Your Way to Washboard Abs
customer_reviews.text: My local gym does not have one so I purchased this one as I have used similar ab rollers in the past and they work great. This one is well constructed and is easy to operate. I like the informational material included and the references to their website for more items.
customer_reviews.author: BigPapi

customer_reviews.title: Much better than any ab wheel I've used!
customer_reviews.text: I have used ab wheels at gyms and those can get wobbly and feel harder to get a good stretch. These work way better than the ones I have used and I am completely happy with my purchase. The handle is comfortable to grip and the wheels roll smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: MattTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: A+ product
customer_reviews.text: These will get your core in shape. I highly recommend this product. It is nothing fancy but it works and it does not break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: pdas980

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my room. Make sure to watch videos on how to properly use this. Its good size as its small and doesnt get in the way of things and can put away easily. Durable so far. I think the double wheel is great for beginners like me. All in all, i'm satisfied with all my purchases from elite sportz equipment
customer_reviews.author: chin howl

customer_reviews.title: Elite Sportz has a great follow up with their clients and communication once the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Elite Sportz has a great follow up with their clients and communication once the product has been ordered. Met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Karin E Challis

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.text: OMG, forget the crunches (j/k), but a few innocent reps of this and when I sneeze or cough I can feel how worked my abs have been with this. Wow. Will keep this up. Quality product and smooth and stable. Nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wei

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment. Durable, works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment. This Ab Wheel Roller Pro is solid and durable. Have been using it for 5 minutes daily and do feel the expected burn or pressure in my Abs muscles. I am giving 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: matas

customer_reviews.title: I use this ab wheel pretty often to get some exercise at home after work ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this ab wheel pretty often to get some exercise at home after work and class and I do think it has helped my core. I'm recovering from a bruised rib so it really has helped me get the ball 'rolling' again. I spoke with the seller about a possible defect and they were more than accomodating. I love the way they kept me satisfied and they really did earn my trust.
customer_reviews.author: mr name

customer_reviews.title: as advertised,  solid and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: excellent piece of equipment! as described, two wheel setup that cannot be taken apart, and a space in the wheels to allow greater balance when tired. While I don't use it everyday, I do every other day and feel for the first time in years a great ab workout. you won't be dissapointed, worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J Marco

customer_reviews.title: Great Core Builder!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy little ab roller! I use it to build my core OBVIOUSLY but not so much to build abs is my point. It is tough! Perfect compliment to body building, yoga and dance. My BF uses it too and he is a 6ft body builder 200 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other rollers that my wife/my daughter/or I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Much better than other rollers that my wife/my daughter/or I have used before. The two wheels being separated make it much more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: This is quality piece of equipment that is stable, compact and easy to use. I find myself just doing a few sets most days at home to supplement my gym workouts. It is an easy way to add volume to my core workouts without stress. Delivery was faster than I figured and it was well packaged. I find quality equipment adds to my willingness to workout regularly. This fits my needs perfectly. The two wheels add stability and can be used safely on any surface. Their smaller size does not any way diminish their effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: It works great for a few minutes or hour workout
customer_reviews.text: you have to know how to use it. It works great for a few minutes or hour workout. For beginners ,use on a carpet because it slows the wheels down. On hard floors,you might slide all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality - plasticy feel. You get what you pay for. Seller was very helpful with return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to balance
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to balance, small enough to store easily without being in the way. Numerous videos online make it a 'core' part of your workout.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Super happy, but sore?
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and what I expected. Good quality, love having the independent business reach out with tutorials and resources!
customer_reviews.author: EK2011

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, it’s easy to use and put together but not seeing much change since I’ve started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: my abs still feel like they've been worked to the limit (and I'm an ...
customer_reviews.text: Will I ever have use of my abs again? Who knows. What I do know is that days after just one workout, my abs still feel like they've been worked to the limit (and I'm an athlete/in pretty decent shape already). I'm serious, guys; I can't even laugh without flinching. If you're looking for a product that is going to give you a solid core workout, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go easy the first time
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the first time will rock your socks. Go easy the first time. Cheap quick workout.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Byers

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: It's an inexpensive no thrills ab roller that does what it's suppose to do more or less. It is extremely hard to get the handle pad on, borderline impossible. I have to use it with half the handle pad just flopping around only half attached. Maybe one day I'll be strong enough to get it all the way on.
customer_reviews.author: Tan

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice Ab roller. It's a pretty intense piece of equipment, I'm still on my knees and I can't extend all the way out yet but wow, what a workout. I can feel it not only in my abs but also in my back, shoulders, and triceps! Also, the double wheel adds stability. I would recommend this product and vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Patrick MacAhmloiabh

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty standard but I would prefer something but more stable
customer_reviews.author: Manchu

product_meta.title: Elite Sportz Equipment Ab Wheel Rollers - Our Ab Exercise Wheels are Sturdy, Smooth Rolling, and has Non- Slip Handles
feature_bullets: NO WOBBLY ROLLOUTS WITH OUR ABS ROLLER, you will find the double wheel design provides more stability than a single wheel design. using a better balanced exercise wheel like ours, means you will have more confidence in the exercise itself, and finally the ability to perform a correct rollout that efficiently works your core

SMOOTH ROLLING ABS WORKOUT EQUIPMENT THAT WILL LAST A LIFETIME, for such a simple device, it sure packs some punch. this lightweight, smooth rolling and compact ab wheel is as sturdy as they come and it will be the last you ever buy. we’re positive you’ll find it smoother than any other ab roller you have ever used

OUR AB WHEEL ROLLER COMES FULLY ASSEMBLED AND READY TO GO, our abs roller pro comes fully assembled and ready to go straight out of the box. you’ll also love the non-slip handles. the handles are really comfortable, and made of a combination of had plastic and softer rubber that provides a nice grip
HANDY VIDEO INSTRUCTIONS ON OUR WEBSITE FOR YOUR AB WHEEL WORKOUTS, we also have some very helpful “how to videos” on our website (URL on packaging) for those that need some video instruction
OUR PROMISE – We stand by and believe in our products! If you have any problems, contact us and we will offer you a full refund or replacement!
